name: Society for Educational & Welfare Activities (SEWA)

address: Near Power House, Choudhani, VPO Nangal Choudhary

briefDescription: Established in 2000, Society for Education & Welfare Activities (SEWA) is registered under the Societies Registration Act XXI of 1860 & renewal under Haryana Registration & Regulation of Societies Act, 2012. Besides SEWA is also registered under FCRA, 1976 and under 12AA of Income Tax Act with an objective for upliftment of Poor & needy Women/Girls, Promotion of Vocational Training Programmes for Self-Employment, Women & Child Development, Social Justice Programme for weaker and vulnerable sections, Promotion of Education, Welfare of Dalit/SC/OBC/BPL / Aged, Environmental Activities, RCH & Other Health Activities, Prevention of HIV/ AIDS & other social welfare programme etc. The main objective of the organization is to upliftment of the general masses through various welfare activities. The organization will obtain its goal through Managing body of the organization.
